characters.character_1: Liam, a young adventurous traveler in his late 20s with short brown hair, green eyes, and light stubble. He wears a casual blue button-up shirt with rolled-up sleeves, beige cargo pants, and brown leather shoes. He carries a small backpack over one shoulder.
characters.character_2: Waiter, a middle-aged Spanish man with short black hair and a neatly trimmed beard. He wears a traditional white shirt, black vest, and black pants with a small notepad in his hand.

places.place_1: A charming small café in Madrid with wooden tables and chairs, a warm and cozy atmosphere, and the aroma of fresh coffee and pastries filling the air. A large chalkboard menu hangs on the wall behind the counter, listing various coffee and pastry options. The walls are decorated with Spanish tiles and framed pictures.
places.place_2: A lively street outside the café with cobblestone pavement, colorful Spanish buildings with balconies, and pedestrians walking by. There is a warm evening glow from street lamps.

negative_common_prompt: No modern technology, no anachronisms, no exaggerated cartoonish features, no futuristic elements.

prompts.prompt: character_1 sits at a wooden table inside place_1.
prompts.negative_prompt: No other customers crowding the scene.
